name: flippz
description: Othello's time has come; introducing Flippz. A refreshed online multiplayer experience for a game that never gets old.

scripts.build: gulp build && echo You can now run the server with "node ./dist/app.js"
scripts.run: gulp build && node -r dotenv/config dist/app.js && echo Help me father, for I have crashed.
scripts.dev: concurrently -n gulp,node -c red,green "gulp dev" "nodemon -r dotenv/config --watch dist src/app"

author: Nadine Kuo, Mitchell Rademaker (https://mitchells.work)
